<!-- wp:etch/text {"metadata":{"name":"Text"},"content":"\u003c!-- wp:etch/raw-html {\u0022content\u0022:\u0022nfunction observeElementProperty(elementSelector, labelSelector, propertyName) {n    const element = document.querySelector(elementSelector);n    const label = document.querySelector(labelSelector);nn    if (!element || !label) return;nn    const updateLabel = () =\u003e {n        const computedStyle = window.getComputedStyle(element);n        const value = computedStyle[propertyName];n        const numericValue = parseFloat(value);n        if (!isNaN(numericValue)) {n            const roundedValue = numericValue.toFixed(2);n            const displayValue = roundedValue.endsWith('.00') ? Math.floor(numericValue) : roundedValue;n            const existingText = label.textContent.split('-')[0].trim();n            label.textContent = `${existingText} - ${displayValue}px`;n        }n    };nn    const resizeObserver = new ResizeObserver(updateLabel);n    resizeObserver.observe(element);nn    updateLabel(); // Initial measurementn}nndocument.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {n    observeElementProperty('[data-ui-content-width]', '[data-ui-content-width-label]', 'width');n    observeElementProperty('[data-ui-grid-gap]', '[data-ui-grid-gap-label]', 'gap');n    observeElementProperty('[data-ui-card-gap]', '[data-ui-card-gap-label]', 'gap');n    observeElementProperty('[data-ui-content-gap]', '[data-ui-content-gap-label]', 'gap');n    observeElementProperty('[data-ui-section-padding]', '[data-ui-section-padding-label]', 'paddingTop');n  observeElementProperty('[data-ui-container-gap]', '[data-ui-container-gap-label]', 'gap');n});\u0022,\u0022unsafe\u0022:\u0022true\u0022} --\u003e\n"} /-->
<!-- /wp:etch/element -->
